name: The Tortoise and the Hare
description:
The Tortoise and the Hare are at it again, for a rematch! Players must race to the finish, trying to get the fastest time, dodging all obstacles that they may face. As they say... "Slow and steady wins the race!".

CONTROLS:
AD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Left Shift - Dash (WASD for direction)

This game was created as part of a 2.5D platformer project. Decided to implement a multiplayer aspect to my game using PhotonNetworking. Hope you enjoy!

Thanks ~ Drafted
